original_title: Manusha hosts top Japanese officials delegation
original_body_lines: Labour and Foreign Employment Minister Manusha Nanayakkara recently hosted a dinner for Japan’s Minister of State in the Cabinet Office Fujimaru Satoshi and former Minister of State for Regional Revitalisation Yamamoto Kozo who were on an official visit to Sri Lanka. Other members of a Japanese delegation to Sri Lanka, officials of the Japanese Embassy in Colombo were also among those who participated at the dinner held at “The Avenue”.
